divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my bathroom looking out the window When I saw what at first what looked like a shooting star. I noticed that it was moving to slow for a shooting star, and to fast for a plane. It was heading east along a known flight path. I didn't see any other light on it. The light was to bright to make out any betails of the object. Then the lights brightness droped to nothing and vanished leaving no trace. The hole time it didn't change course or speed. I don't know what it was but it filled me with wonder.
Summary: Briliant white like a shooting star moving slowly.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Antioch
There were no other sightings in Antioch on or around May 15th 2010
